data.name: Barn&Farm Renovator
data.detailed_description:
Check out also other games:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120320/Builder_Simulator
https://store.steampowered.com/app/991170/Barn_Finders/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1424060/BarnFinders_Amerykan_Dream/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1758650/Whisky_Bottler



As a Barn&Farm Renovator you can:
  • Buy dilapidated or abandoned barns and turn them into modern homes.
Make profits on their sale and invest in more barns to flip. Your customers’ expectations and requirements will often surprise you.


  • You have a limited number of days and cash to transform an old barn into your customers’ dream home.
If you exceed the time and budget allotted, they will not be happy. If you finish earlier, you can count on a generous bonus.


  • You won’t get much done without proper tools like:
Cordless screwdriver, wood saw, paintbrushes, power drill, nail gun, trowels, saws, jigsaw, levels and others will come in handy…


  • …but the Final Touch is totally up to you.
Everything needs to be pimped out and spiffy but also in its right spot – furniture, home appliances and entertainment centers, house plants – all very stylish and chic. Don’t fret; there is lots of free space for improvisation and distinctive décor.


  • Before closing the deal, remember to get rid of any pests and uninvited guests too (critters from nearby fields and forests).

data.short_description: Change the look and interior of old, dilapidated barns and farms. From changes in design to the perfect final touch. Improvise when you need to, but decorate with style and panache. Invest in the development of your remodeling company and celebrate each successful makeover.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 3550 / FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660Ti / R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 4570 / Ryzen 7 1700x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / RX 480 GB 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
